sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { login } from '../actions/userActions' import { Form, Button, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' const LoginScreen = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const dispatch = useDispatch() const userLogin = useSelector((state) => state.userLogin) const { loading, error, userInfo } = userLogin const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(login(email, password)) } return ( <>
Adres email setEmail(e.target.value)} > Hasło setPassword(e.target.value)} >
LOGIN

Enter your email:

setEmail(e.target.value)} />

Enter your password:

setPassword(e.target.value)} />
) } export default LoginScreen
